remarks: Lemma for frege102 (via frege92).  Proposition 53 of [Frege1879] p. 50. _Note:_ in the Bauer-Meenfelberg translation published in van Heijenoort's collection _From Frege to Goedel_, this proof has the minor clause and result swapped.  (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: frege53b $p |- ( [ x / y ] ph -> ( x = z -> [ z / y ] ph ) ) $.
